content: dragon scale cowl designed by madison prince of fleur ange apparel pattern overview this pattern was inspired by dragon s yarn from my shrek yarn collection of course you re a girl dragon i wanted a simple pattern to show off the variegation of the yarn while still having enough texture to keep it interesting it s the perfect cowl for those crisp autumn morning walks pattern gauge and specs 18 stitches x 28 row in stockinette finished cowl 24 in circumference 8 wide materials needed 1 skein fleur ange apparel merino worsted or 185y/170m of a similar worsted weight yarn 4 5 mm us 7 16 circular needles stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving in ends abbreviations k knit p purl dragon scale cowl - © madison prince november 2025 1 k2tog knit 2 stitches together yo yarn over instructions cast on 108 stitches using the long tail cast on place marker and join for knitting in the round making sure not to twist your stitches round 1 k round 2 p round 3 yo k2tog repeat to end of round round 4 p round 5 k round 6-14 k repeat rounds 2-14 three more times 4 times total then repeat rounds 2-5 once bind off knitwise loosely weave in ends block and enjoy your new cowl i would love to see your creations use the hashtag #dragonscalecowl and tag me on instagram dragon scale cowl - © madison prince november 2025 2
